articles.title: EU proposes making solar panels mandatory on all new buildings - The Independent
articles.description: New proposal aims to rapidly reduce dependence on Russian fossil and supercharge Europe’s transition to green energy
articles.content: Solar panels would be mandatory on all new buildings in the European Union under a new proposal aimed at ending its reliance on Russian fossil fuels by 2027 and supercharging its transition to green … [+4962 chars]

articles.author: Anna Cooban, CNN Business
articles.title: Europe plans to spend $221 billion to ditch Russia's energy - CNN
articles.description: The European Union has unveiled a €210 billion ($221 billion) plan to wean itself off Russian oil and gas.

articles.title: Russia says nearly 700 more Mariupol fighters surrender - Reuters
articles.description: Nearly 700 more Ukrainian fighters surrendered at the Mariupol steelworks in the past 24 hours, Russia said on Wednesday, but leaders were reported to still be holed up inside, delaying the final end of Europe's longest and bloodiest battle for decades.
articles.content: KYIV/MARIUPOL, Ukraine, May 18 (Reuters) - Nearly 700 more Ukrainian fighters surrendered at the Mariupol steelworks in the past 24 hours, Russia said on Wednesday, but leaders were reported to still… [+6381 chars]

articles.title: Obesity: another dangerous pandemic - Times of Malta
articles.description:
The World Health Organisation predicts that, in some European countries, obesity will overtake smoking as the main risk factor for preventable cancer over the next few decades.
At this rate, one of those countries is sure to be Malta.
In the WHO’s European Re…
